thread.title: Florence man indicted on 2,291 child pornography charges involving local victims
thread.title_full: Florence man indicted on 2,291 child pornography charges involving local victims

author: Ashley Remkus | aremkus@al.com
title: Florence man indicted on 2,291 child pornography charges involving local victims
text: Jeffery Dale Hunt, 48, has been indicted by a Lauderdale County grand jury on 1,996 counts of possession of child pornography and 295 counts of production of child pornography, Florence police announced today.
